ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound scallops, rinsed and patted dry

cookingTips: Marinate scallops briefly (15-30 minutes) to avoid over-softening their delicate texture
Pat scallops dry after marinating to ensure proper browning when seared
Serve warm or at room temperature for optimal flavor and texture contrast
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This simple preparation lets the scallop's natural sweetness shine. Guide the user through selecting quality scallops and executing a quick sear that achieves a golden crust while maintaining tenderness.
